svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 25, 2023" date: "2023-11-24"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko :
Devnet-11: mostly stable Devnet-12 : planned for next week if 3+ CL clients are ready
Goerli: upgrade unlikely in December; client team & EF validators will be stopped 3
months after upgrading (or 1 month after mainnet upgrade if later), then 1 month of
chaos testing eth_multicallV1 proposed addition to JSON RPC
* Devnet-11: mostly stable
Devnet-11: mostly stable
* Devnet-12 : planned for next week if 3+ CL clients are ready
Devnet-12 : planned for next week if 3+ CL clients are ready
* Goerli: upgrade unlikely in December; client team & EF validators will be stopped 3
chaos testing
* eth_multicallV1 proposed addition to JSON RPC
eth_multicallV1 proposed addition to JSON RPC
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.00% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold Lido node operator InfStones
server vulnerabilities disclosed
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.00% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold
* Lido node operator InfStones
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~85%
supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 41% &
Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
* Geographic diversity needed , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Geographic diversity needed , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
* Dapplion: EIP6914 (reuse withdrawn validator indices) may not be required for several
years
Dapplion: EIP6914 (reuse withdrawn validator indices) may not be required for several
* MEV Order Flow Auctions overview
MEV Order Flow Auctions overview
Client releases
* Execution layer: Reth v0.1.0-alpha.11 : Cancun-ready, op-reth, adds eth_callBundle,
eth_getProof & trace_filter and more accurate RPC tracing
* Reth v0.1.0-alpha.11 : Cancun-ready, op-reth, adds eth_callBundle, eth_getProof &
trace_filter and more accurate RPC tracing
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs EIP7563 : Time Capsule encryption via VDF
EIPs
* EIP7563 : Time Capsule encryption via VDF
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7564 : Contract wallet management NFT
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7564 : Contract wallet management NFT
Stuff for developers
* Foundry: forge-std v1.7.3 : adds mock ERC20 & ERC721 contracts and new cheat codes:
stop/start state diff recording & compute create/create2 address Foundry-devops v0.1.0
: get most recent deployment, removed ffi requirement anvil-web3 : create & interact
with Anvil instances from Python
Foundry:
* forge-std v1.7.3 : adds mock ERC20 & ERC721 contracts and new cheat codes: stop/start
state diff recording & compute create/create2 address
forge-std v1.7.3 : adds mock ERC20 & ERC721 contracts and new cheat codes: stop/start
* Foundry-devops v0.1.0 : get most recent deployment, removed ffi requirement
Foundry-devops v0.1.0 : get most recent deployment, removed ffi requirement
* anvil-web3 : create & interact with Anvil instances from Python
anvil-web3 : create & interact with Anvil instances from Python
* Edge (EVM domain specific language) specification
Edge (EVM domain specific language) specification
* Impersonator iframe : connect to a dapp in iframe via SafeConnector
Impersonator iframe : connect to a dapp in iframe via SafeConnector
* Solidity inheritance puzzle solution
Solidity inheritance puzzle solution
* Scaffold-ETH 2 challenges teaching Solidity, Hardhat, NextJS, Scaffold-ETH 2 & The
Graph
Scaffold-ETH 2 challenges teaching Solidity, Hardhat, NextJS, Scaffold-ETH 2 & The
* Curta Cup CTF solutions: 1st placed team [video] & 2nd placed team
Curta Cup CTF solutions: 1st placed team [video] & 2nd placed team
* Dan Finlay: redeemDelegation , proposal for more conversational wallet connections
Dan Finlay: redeemDelegation , proposal for more conversational wallet connections
Security
* KyberSwap Elastic (concentrated liquidity) $54M exploit on mainnet, L2s & sidechains;
exploit reproduction
KyberSwap Elastic (concentrated liquidity) $54M exploit on mainnet, L2s & sidechains;
* Guide to recovering funds from compromised keys using HackedWalletRecovery
Guide to recovering funds from compromised keys using HackedWalletRecovery
Ecosystem
* ETHGlobal: Istanbul hackathon finalists 2024 hackathon calendar : London, Sydney,
Brussels, Singapore, San Francisco & DevCon
* Istanbul hackathon finalists
Istanbul hackathon finalists
* 2024 hackathon calendar : London, Sydney, Brussels, Singapore, San Francisco & DevCon
2024 hackathon calendar : London, Sydney, Brussels, Singapore, San Francisco & DevCon
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 12.1 to 413.7 gwei, with 31.7 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 21.8 gwei 7.4k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 12.1 to 413.7 gwei, with 31.7 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
* 7.4k ETH net burn this week
7.4k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $1,930 - $2,131, currently $2,076
ETHUSD : $1,930 - $2,131, currently $2,076
* ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* Blast (preannounced L2) promoted as native yield , taking deposits (no withdrawal),
controlled by 3/5 multisig, pyramid style rewards, ETH deposits being invested via Lido
Blast (preannounced L2) promoted as native yield , taking deposits (no withdrawal),
* Circle bridged USDC standard , L2s can deploy with option to later upgrade to native
issuance
Circle bridged USDC standard , L2s can deploy with option to later upgrade to native
* Nick Johnson: .eth & DNS root explainer
Nick Johnson: .eth & DNS root explainer
* evm.storage EOA pages : view snapshot of an account at a specific block
evm.storage EOA pages : view snapshot of an account at a specific block
Job Listings
* Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
* Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
* Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
* Nethermind: Lead Software Engineer , BizDev & CTO
Nethermind: Lead Software Engineer , BizDev & CTO
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* Binance: $4.3B settlement with DoJ, FinCEN, OFAC & CFTC; CZ resigns as CEO
Binance: $4.3B settlement with DoJ, FinCEN, OFAC & CFTC; CZ resigns as CEO
* SEC allege Kraken operates as an unregistered securities exchange
SEC allege Kraken operates as an unregistered securities exchange
* Tether froze 225M in stolen USDT linked to international crime syndicate
Tether froze 225M in stolen USDT linked to international crime syndicate
* Wyoming Stable Token Commission request for info/proposals for their stablecoin
Wyoming Stable Token Commission request for info/proposals for their stablecoin
* Bittrex Global winding down
Bittrex Global winding down
* Coindesk bought by Bullish (centralized exchange)
Coindesk bought by Bullish (centralized exchange)
General
* Hacks: HTX & Heco bridge $99M lost and Kronos Research (market maker) $26M lost
Hacks: HTX & Heco bridge $99M lost and Kronos Research (market maker) $26M lost
* Binius : implementation in Rust of SNARK for towers of binary fields
Binius : implementation in Rust of SNARK for towers of binary fields
* BabySpartan : Lasso-based SNARK for non-uniform Plonkish arithmetization
BabySpartan : Lasso-based SNARK for non-uniform Plonkish arithmetization
* Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) explainer
Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) explainer
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
Permalink for this weekâ€™s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-november-25-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Nov 29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19 ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
Nov 29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19 ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
* Nov 30 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
Nov 30 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
* Dec 4 â€“ ETHVenice
Dec 4 â€“ ETHVenice
* Dec 6-7 â€“ Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
Dec 6-7 â€“ Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
* Dec 7 â€“ Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF 3 voting ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
Dec 7 â€“ Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF 3 voting ends (support Week in Ethereum News )
* Dec 7-10 â€“ ETHGlobal Pragma & ETHIndia (Bangalore)
Dec 7-10 â€“ ETHGlobal Pragma & ETHIndia (Bangalore)
* Jan 15 â€“ EFâ€™s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline

* Feb 23-Mar 3 â€“ ETHDenver BUIDLWeek & hackathon
